title: Marvin S. Porter Memorial Scholarship Endowment
description: To provide a scholarships and general student support at the University of Colorado School of Public Health in the Department of Biostatistics and Informatics in memory of Marvin S. Porter.
marketingContent: To provide a scholarships and general student support at the University of Colorado School of Public Health in the Department of Biostatistics and Informatics in memory of Marvin S. Porter.
